Windlord:


Windlord was stunned and falling in stasis again


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "CatMaster o" <CatMastero@y...> wrote:
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > Winlord:
> > 
> > Windlord was almost in stasis.
> > 
> 
> Kenzo had been shielded from the explosion by the rock that he had
> been using but had gotten scratched up by falling debris.  He 
walked
> out into the open taken back by all the destruction.  Remains of 
the
> cannon, sweeps, and parts of bots lay everywhere on a battlefield
> covered with craters.  He snapped back when he realized that 
several
> bots could be hurt.  He approached Windlord and kneeled down to 
start
> repairs.
> "It's going to be okay buddy." He said softly.
